data.name: SS_CM_CONSULTAPAGOEF_HANA
data.value: SELECT 'PA' AS Metodo, T0."DocEntry", T0."DocNum", SUBSTRING( T0."CardCode",0,19) AS CardCode, IFNULL(T0."CardName",'') AS CardName, T0."DocDate", CAST(T0."DocTotal" AS DECIMAL (16,2)) AS DocTotal, (CASE WHEN T0."TrsfrSum" > 0 THEN 'CTA' WHEN T0."CheckSum" > 0 THEN 'CHQ' END) AS FormaPago, T0."DocCurr" AS Moneda, (CASE WHEN T0."TrsfrSum" > 0 THEN 'CTE' ELSE '' END) AS TipoCuenta, IFNULL(T1."DflAccount",'') AS NumeroCuenta, T0."JrnlMemo" AS Referencia, T1."U_TIPO_ID" AS TipoCliente, T1."LicTradNum" AS NumeroID, (CASE WHEN T1."BankCode" = -1 THEN '' ELSE T1."BankCode" END) AS CodBanco FROM "OVPM" T0 INNER JOIN "OCRD" T1 ON T0."CardCode" = T1."CardCode" WHERE (T0."TrsfrSum" > 0 OR T0."CheckSum" > 0)

data.name: SS_CM_CONSULTAPAGOEF_SQL
data.value: SELECT 'PA' AS Metodo, T0.DocEntry, T0.DocNum, SUBSTRING( T0."CardCode",0,19) AS CardCode, ISNULL(T0.CardName,'') AS CardName, T0.DocDate, CAST(T0.DocTotal AS DECIMAL (16,2)) AS DocTotal, (CASE WHEN T0.TrsfrSum > 0 THEN 'CTA' WHEN T0.CheckSum > 0 THEN 'CHQ' END) AS FormaPago , T0.DocCurr AS Moneda, (CASE WHEN T0.TrsfrSum > 0 THEN 'CTE' ELSE '' END) AS TipoCuenta, ISNULL(T1.DflAccount,'') AS NumeroCuenta, T0.JrnlMemo AS Referencia, T1.U_TIPO_ID AS TipoCliente, T1.LicTradNum AS NumeroID, (CASE WHEN T1.BankCode = -1 THEN '' ELSE T1.BankCode END) AS CodBanco FROM OVPM T0 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN OCRD T1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON T0.CardCode = T1.CardCode WHERE (T0."TrsfrSum" > 0 Or T0."CheckSum" > 0)

data.name: SS_NC_EST_FAC_REL_HANA
SS_NC_EST_FAC_REL_SQL
data.value:
DECLARE @DOCENTRYFAC VARCHAR(10) DECLARE @DESCRIPCION VARCHAR(10) DECLARE @PRODUCTO VARCHAR(10) DECLARE @OBJETYPE INT SET @PRODUCTO = (SELECT $[ORIN.DOCTYPE]) IF @PRODUCTO = 'S' BEGIN SET @DOCENTRYFAC =CONVERT(INT,(select $[$-39.25.Number])) SET @OBJETYPE = CONVERT(INT,(select $[$-39.23.BaseType])) END IF @PRODUCTO = 'I' BEGIN SET @DOCENTRYFAC =CONVERT(INT,(select $[$-38.45.Number])) SET @OBJETYPE = CONVERT(INT,(select $[$-38.43.BaseType])) END
IF @OBJETYPE = 13 BEGIN SET @DESCRIPCION = (SELECT T0.U_SS_Est FROM OINV T0 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE T0.DOCENTRY = @DOCENTRYFAC) SELECT @DESCRIPCION END
IF @OBJETYPE = 203 BEGIN SET @DESCRIPCION = (SELECT T0.U_SS_Est FROM ODPI T0 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE T0.DOCENTRY = @DOCENTRYFAC) SELECT @DESCRIPCION END

data.name: SS_NUMAUTO_GR_HANA
SS_NUMAUTO_GR_SQL
data.value:
DECLARE @SERIE INT DECLARE @DESCRIPCION VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @CODIGO VARCHAR(37)
SET @SERIE = (select $[ODLN.series]) SET @DESCRIPCION = (SELECT T1.SERIESNAME FROM NNM1 T1 WHERE T1.SERIES = @SERIE )
SET @CODIGO = (SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(U_NumAut,'') FROM [dbo].[@SS_DOCLEGALES] T2 WHERE T2.U_Documento = @DESCRIPCION AND t2.u_Estado = 'A' AND T2.U_TipoDoc = 'GR')
SELECT @CODIGO

data.name: SS_NUMAUTO_LQE_HANA
SS_NUMAUTO_LQE_SQL
data.value:
DECLARE @COD_PROVEEDOR VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @DIRECCION VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @SERIES INT DECLARE @SERIENAME VARCHAR(15) DECLARE @CODIGO VARCHAR(3) SET @SERIES = (Select $[opch.series]) SET @SERIENAME = (SELECT SERIESNAME FROM NNM1 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ObjectCode = 18 AND Series = @SERIES ) SET @COD_PROVEEDOR = (Select $[opch.cardcode]) SET @DIRECCION = (Select $[opch.paytocode])
IF @SERIENAME LIKE 'LQE%' BEGIN SET @CODIGO = '0000000000' SELECT @CODIGO END else begin SET @CODIGO = '' SELECT @CODIGO end

data.name: SS_PARROQUIA_HANA
SS_PARROQUIA_SQL
data.value: DECLARE @PROVINCIA VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @CANTON VARCHAR(100) SET @PROVINCIA = (SELECT $[$U_SS_Provincia.0.0]) SET @CANTON = (SELECT $[$U_SS_Canton.0.0]) SELECT DISTINCT left("U_SS_NomPar",65) FROM "@SS_ESQCOD" WHERE "U_SS_NomPro"= @PROVINCIA AND "U_SS_NomCan"= @CANTON

data.name: SS_PM_OBTENERPAGOS_UDO_HANA
data.value: SELECT 'N' AS chek, T0."DocEntry", T0."DocNum", T0."U_Tipo", T0."U_MedioPago", T0."Creator", T0."CreateDate", (SELECT SUM(T1."U_Pago") FROM "@SS_PM_DET1" T1 WHERE T0."DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry") AS Pagar FROM "@SS_PM_CAB" T0

data.name: SS_PM_OBTENERPAGOS_UDO_SQL
data.value: SELECT 'N' AS chek, T0.DocEntry, T0.DocNum, T0."U_Tipo", T0."U_MedioPago", T0.Creator, T0.CreateDate, (SELECT SUM(T1.U_Pago) FROM "@SS_PM_DET1" T1 WHERE T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry) AS Pagar FROM "@SS_PM_CAB" T0

SS_PUNTOEMISION_FV_SQL
data.value:
DECLARE @SERIE INT DECLARE @CODIGO VARCHAR(15)
SET @SERIE = (select $[OINV.series])
SET @CODIGO = (SELECT T2.U_PuntoEmi FROM [dbo].[@SS_SERD] T2 WHERE T2.U_SerId = @SERIE AND T2.U_TipoD = 'FV')
SELECT @CODIGO

data.name: SS_SUSTRI_HANA
SS_TIPOCOMPROBANTE_APLICA_NC_HANA
SS_TIPOCOMPROBANTE_APLICA_NC_SQL
data.value:
DECLARE @DOCENTRYFAC VARCHAR(9) DECLARE @DESCRIPCION VARCHAR(2) DECLARE @PRODUCTO VARCHAR(1) SET @PRODUCTO = (SELECT $[ORIN.DOCTYPE]) IF @PRODUCTO = 'S' BEGIN SET @DOCENTRYFAC =CONVERT(INT,(select $[$-39.25.Number])) END IF @PRODUCTO = 'I' BEGIN SET @DOCENTRYFAC =CONVERT(INT,(select $[$-38.45.Number])) END SET @DESCRIPCION = (SELECT T0.U_SS_TipCom FROM OINV T0 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE T0.DOCENTRY = @DOCENTRYFAC)
IF ISNULL(@DESCRIPCION,'')='' BEGIN SELECT LEFT(CODE,2) AS CÓDIGO,Name AS DESCRIPCIÓN FROM [dbo].[@SS_TIPCOMAUT] WHERE U_SS_TipoTra = 2 AND CODE IN ('01_1','18','41_1') ORDER BY U_SS_Orden END IF ISNULL(@DESCRIPCION,'')!='' BEGIN SELECT @DESCRIPCION END
